newsitem.title: CANADA: Paintplas offers C$14.50/shr for Tarxien.
newsitem.headline: Paintplas offers C$14.50/shr for Tarxien.

text.p: PaintPlas Inc said it was offering to buy all the outstanding common shares of Tarxien Corp for C$14.50 a share in cash.
The offer will be structured as a permitted bid under the Shareholders Rights Plan adopted by Tarxien and will be conditional on two-thirds of the shares being tendered.
PaintPlas Inc paints exterior plastic and metal body parts for the auto industry and other services such as sub-assembly, part preparation and just-in-time delivery to assembly plants.
The offer came after bids by Ventra Group Inc and Gecamex Technologies Inc
Ventra raised its offer of C$8 a share plus two Ventra shares for each Tarxien share to C$9.25 a share plus shares and warrants in reponse to a C$14.10 a share offer from Gecamex.
